  • Constructor Details

    • Deck

      public Deck(List<Card> cards)
      Constructs a new Deck object with the specified list of cards.
      Parameters:
      cards - the list of cards to initialize the deck with

  • Method Details

    • setOccupied

      public void setOccupied()
      Marks the current Deck instance as occupied by setting the internal state to true. The isOccupied flag is used to track whether the Deck is currently in use or blocked.

    • setFree

      public void setFree()
      Marks the deck as free by setting the `isOccupied` flag to false. This indicates that the deck is no longer occupied or in use.

    • isOccupied

      public boolean isOccupied()
      Checks if the deck is currently occupied.
      Returns:
      true if the deck is occupied, otherwise false.

    • shuffle

      public void shuffle()
      Randomly shuffles the order of the cards in the deck. The method rearranges the elements of the internal card list (CardList) in a random order using Collections.shuffle.

    • getCardList

      public List<Card> getCardList()
      Retrieves the list of cards currently held in the deck.
      Returns:
      a list of Card objects representing the cards in the deck.

    • drawCard

      public Card drawCard()
      Draws and removes the first card from the deck if the deck is not empty.
      Returns:
      the first card from the deck, or null if the deck is empty.

    • removeCard

      public void removeCard(Card c)
      Removes the specified card from the card list if the list is not empty.
      Parameters:
      c - The card to be removed from the card list.
